features: 🎃【3-Color Temperature】Take the upgraded technology chips, our USB table lamp realizes 3 color temperatures to meet your different demands. 2700K Warm white is great for the nightstand lighting, 4000K natural white is a perfect choice for basic daily life, the 5000K daylight white highly suit for reading and play electronics, you can choose the most fairish light by your preference.

🎃【Fast Charging USB port & AC Outlet】To facilitate your life, we equipped this bedside lamp with one USB port and an AC outlet, which enables you to charge your electronics at any time, hassle-free to looking for sockets additionally when you are not convenient, greatly saving your space and keep it tidy.

🎃【Refined Exterior & Wide Application】Unlike other cheap plastic base bed lamps, our bedroom lamps for nightstand are made of high-quality sleek metal base and premium grey linen fabric lampshade. It is elegance enough, perfect for modern, minimalistic, or retro decoration. You can put it anywhere you want lighting, such as bedroom, living room, office, Reading, and so on, adding a chic aesthetic to your house.

🎃【One free A19 Bulb included】For your convenience, we offered one 9W, 800 lm energy-saving LED bulb for free, you don't need to buy bulbs separately. The 9W energy-saving LED bulb is equal to 100W incandescent bulb, save at least 90% energy bills for your family. Besides, it has no flicker and dazzle, will emit a smooth lighting for your family, greatly eliminating eyes exhaustion and protecting your health.

🎃【Package Contained & Easy Installation 】Package contains all accessories for assembling: a grey lampshade, a metal base, a led bulb, and a user manual. With the detailed illustration in the manual, you can just take a few minutes to finish the installation. It is a huge joy for most DIY customers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Modern & Stylish 3-Color Temperature USB Table Lamp Specializing in LED lamp for over 10 years, our company gathers the output and R&D to provide with the most creative and durable lamp. After one year R&D, we designed a unique 3-color temperature bedside lamp, which can meet your different daily demands. 3000K warm white is perfect for you or a baby's sleeping. You can also turn on it when you lying on the bed playing electronics, no fear of darkness. 4000K Natural light is appropriate to working at the deep night but with no worries to bother your roommate. 5000K daylight white highly suit for your reading at night. It is worth mention that all of the lamps equipped with a USB port and AC outlet, which allows you to charge 2 devices at the same time. You will never have any need to look for sockets and your nightstand will also always keep tidy with no messy cables. For all lamps in our store, it is not only a loyal lighting partner but also a perfect decoration for your house, make your home space full of a cozy atmosphere and modern look feeling.

Product Details 3 Color Temperature Using the pull chain switch on the desk lamp, you can choose from 2700K warm white to 5000K daylight white to meet your various daily demand Super Covenient USB Port & AC Ouput Bedside lamp with USB port and AC Outlet enables you to charge your phone or other devices at any time. AC outlet is designed for device that doesn't have USB port and can only be plugin by AC outlet, like humidifiers, hairdryer, curling iron, etc,... No need to look for sockets all around to charge. Linen Fabric Lampshade and Sturdy Metal Base A LED Bulb Included For your convenience, we offered one 9W, 800 lm energy-saving LED bulb for free, hassle-free to buy bulbs separately.
Whether you are reading, studying, or play electronics, our desk light can always be your loyal lighting partner to offer the appropriate light for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice sleek looking lamp. It has different brightness levels. Easy to put together. Nice size for a nightstand. Good quality lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink office lamp 💕
reviews.reviewText: I ❤️ LOVE it! It’s not too big for the desk, it’s bright and love the pink color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is perfect for my bedroom. It fits nicely on my dresser. I love the 2 way bulb so that you can have different lighting depending on your mood. It is also great when charging my electronics. I can either use the plug option or the USB option. Both charge well. I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This lamp provides an excellent lighting solution for any occasion
reviews.reviewText: The WIHTU 3-Color Temperature Bedside Lamp is a great addition to any bedroom or living space. With its sleek design and useful features, this lamp provides an excellent lighting solution for any occasion.One of the best things about this lamp is its 3-color temperature settings. You can easily switch between warm white, natural white, and cool white depending on your lighting needs. This feature is especially useful for bedtime reading or late-night work, as you can adjust the lighting to fit your preferences.In addition, the WIHTU bedside lamp also features a USB port and AC outlet. This means you can charge your phone, tablet, or other devices right at your bedside without having to worry about finding a power source. The AC outlet is also useful for plugging in other electronics such as a laptop or speaker.The lamp is also very easy to use, with a simple touch control panel that allows you to adjust the brightness, color temperature, and power settings. The lamp is also adjustable, allowing you to position the light exactly where you need it.Overall, the WIHTU 3-Color Temperature Bedside Lamp is a versatile and practical lighting solution for any bedroom or living space. Its adjustable color temperature, USB port, and AC outlet make it a great choice for anyone who needs a reliable and convenient bedside lamp.

Gran adquisición el costo calidad es muy bueno!! viene todo lo necesario para montarlo con las manos, alumbra super bien y tiene 3 tipos de tonalidad de luz. Muy recomendable
Work fine. Could have been a little bit bigger.

I was looking for stylish & bright lamps to replace my previous ones . These seemed to be the perfect purchases..Having contacted the retailer to make sure they. were dimmable bulbs & could be controlled by a dedicated wall-mounted LED dimmer , I bought a pair .The bulbs included were not only NOT dimmable (they flickered horribly) , but they changed color temperatures every time they were switched on. I solved that problem by replacing those 3 color temperature bulbs with dimmable ones (single color). The seller was kind enough to discount the cost to offset my purchase of those LED bulbs.Too gimmicky with the AC outlet & 3 color bulbs, I wouldn't recommend buying them...Photos show low & high levels of these lamps.
